## layouts.Api.observe() method

Creates a subscription for the layout matter associated to the current context or the specified matter id if provided.

Only one subscription will be made per session. Regardless of how many times this function is called, the last registered callback will be used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
observe(callback: (layout: layouts.LayoutMatter) => void, matterId?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (layout: [layouts.LayoutMatter](./smokeball-client-sdk.layouts.layoutmatter.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | the function to execute when a change is made to layout(s) in Smokeball. |
|  matterId | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the layout to subscribe to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```
sdk.layouts.observe(layouts => {
  // Perform syncing code here.
});
```
